law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 457, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1800, 1802, 1803, 1804, 1808.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Establishment of ferries -- Granting and sale of ferry privileges.
